original_title: Trains delayed due to derailment between near Maradana station
original_body_lines: The derailment of a train between Colombo Fort and Maradana railway stations has delayed train services on several lines, according to the Railway Department.

It is reported that the train which had derailed near the Kompanna Veediya railway station this morning (28) had derailed once again near the Maradana station after it had been re-railed and was en route to the train yard.
